commit.message:
Rollup merge of #96955 - Aaron1011:pretty-print-sort, r=petrochenkov

Remove (transitive) reliance on sorting by DefId in pretty-printer

This moves us a step closer to removing the `PartialOrd/`Ord` impls
for `DefId`. See #90317

Rollup merge of #96955 - Aaron1011:pretty-print-sort, r=petrochenkov

Remove (transitive) reliance on sorting by DefId in pretty-printer

This moves us a step closer to removing the `PartialOrd/`Ord` impls
for `DefId`. See #90317
